title: Unity Game Developer
job_description:
About the job

Company Description
 
David's Studio, A Indian game development group dedicated to creating immersive and innovative gaming experiences. Our expert team excels in using cutting-edge tools like Unity, Unreal Engine, Blender, and SpeedTree to deliver visually stunning and highly interactive games across PC, console, and mobile platforms. We pride ourselves on our commitment to quality and innovation, ensuring each project meets the highest standards. Our collaborative approach allows us to tailor game mechanics and narratives to the unique needs of our clients. Join us on our journey to shape the future of gaming.

 Role Description
 
This is a Part-Time remote role for a Unity Game Developer. We Offer Experience for the Freshers. The Unity Game Developer will be responsible for game programming and designing, developing gameplay, programming in object-oriented languages, and refining game mechanics. The developer will work closely with other team members to build and deploy interactive games across multiple platforms.

 Qualifications
 

Proficiency in Game Programming and Gameplay Programming
Strong skills in Programming and Object-Oriented Programming (OOP)
Experience with Game Design principles and practices
Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills
Ability to work collaboratively in a remote environment
Experience with Unity or other game engines is a plus
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Game Development, or a related field

title: MERN Stack Developer
job_description:
About the job

MERN Stack Developer (Contract - 2 Months)

Location: Remote

About RudrX Techlabs:
RudrX Techlabs is a fast-growing tech company specializing in delivering innovative digital solutions to clients across industries. We pride ourselves on a collaborative and efficient culture, working on impactful projects using modern technology stacks.

Role Overview:
We‚Äôre looking for a MERN Stack Developer to join us on a short-term contract basis. You‚Äôll be working closely with our product and design teams to build and deliver high-quality web applications. This role is perfect for someone who thrives in a fast-paced environment and can take ownership of the development cycle from start to finish.

Responsibilities:
Develop, test, and deploy full-stack web applications using MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js

How to Apply:

üëâ Send your portfolio or GitHub, and resume to workwithme@dharmik.dev or apply directly via LinkedIn.

title: Full Stack Developer
job_description:
About the job

About the Role

PurpleMerit is seeking smart, motivated individuals for a Full Stack Developer role. You will work alongside talented engineers, designers, and product managers to design and deliver end-to-end web and mobile applications that drive real business value. This position involves a mandatory internship-to-full-time pathway designed to nurture and evaluate your technical and collaborative skills in a real-world environment.

 

Experience: 0-1 Years

Location: Onsite (Banashankari, Bengaluru ) 

Pincode: 560085

 

Key Responsibilities

Design and implement scalable full-stack web applications from concept to deployment.
Build and maintain end to end websites, Chrome extensions, PWAs, and mobile apps (Android & iOS).
Develop RESTful and GraphQL APIs for frontend-backend integration.
Architect systems with a strong focus on system design, scalability, and maintainability.
Implement secure authentication and authorization: OAuth, JWT, session management, role-based access.
Integrate AI tools, agents, and APIs to support product innovation and team productivity.
Manage cloud infrastructure (AWS/Azure/GCP), CI/CD pipelines, and efficient deployments.
Design and optimize databases (PostgreSQL, MongoDB): schema design, normalization, indexing, and security.
Write reusable, testable, and efficient code; ensure code quality through testing and best practices.
Troubleshoot and debug production issues and optimize application speed and scalability.
Self-manage tasks and deadlines independently in a remote startup environment.
Collaborate effectively with UI/UX designers, product managers, and stakeholders.
Document software designs, decisions, and features.
Handle domain connection, hosting, and deployment.
Stay current with new technologies, and contribute ideas to drive technical innovation.

 

Core Skills

Proficiency in Java (Spring Boot, Spring MVC, Spring Security).
Experience with JavaScript frameworks: React.js, Angular, Node.js, Express.js, Flask/Django (Python).
Knowledge of RESTful API design, microservices architecture, and authentication protocols (OAuth, JWT).
Experience with SQL (PostgreSQL) and NoSQL (MongoDB).
Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud), Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD pipelines.
Experience in Android (Java/Kotlin) and iOS (Swift/Objective-C) is a plus.
Server management experience with Linux/Unix, Nginx, and Apache.
Ability to integrate AI tools and APIs; basic knowledge of AI agents and prompt engineering.
Strong problem-solving mindset emphasizing simplicity, performance, and continuous improvement.

 

Soft Skills

Self-motivated and independent with the ability to manage time and meet deadlines without supervision.
Strong collaboration skills in remote and distributed team environments.
Willingness to quickly learn and adapt to new technologies and changing requirements.
Ownership mindset, taking responsibility from design through deployment and maintenance.

 

Qualifications

Bachelor‚Äôs degree in computer science is required

 

Things to Keep in Mind

No laptop or physical assets will be provided by PurpleMerit; candidates must use their own systems.
Preferred system RAM size is 16GB or 32GB to handle development tasks efficiently.
Work timings are fixed: 9:00 AM ‚Äì 6:30 PM IST, Monday to Saturday.
Freelancing or any other external work during the internship is strictly prohibited and may lead to termination.
Internship duration is mandatory 6 months for consideration for full-time roles.
Candidates must have strong remote communication skills and experience working in distributed teams.
Only applications sent to the specified email will be considered .

 

Salary Structure

Internship Fixed Stipend: ‚Çπ12,000 per month for 6 months. 
Every 3 months, performance audits to determine eligibility for stipend hikes.
Performance-Based Increment: Interns will undergo performance reviews every three months, with top performers eligible for stipend increases up to ‚Çπ16,000 per month based on their project impact and growth during the internship.
Full-Time Salary after successful internship completion: ‚Çπ3 LPA to ‚Çπ6.5 LPA, based on performance, leadership, and technical skills demonstrated during the internship period.

 

How to Apply

Send your updated resume to career@purplemerit.com before 11:55 PM on 12 August 2025.

Only applications sent to this email will be considered.

Resumes submitted via LinkedIn or other channels will NOT be reviewed.

 Please ensure your application contains all relevant details requested in this job post.

 

Why Join PurpleMerit?

Make direct impact your work shapes real products and business outcomes.
Work remotely with agile, collaborative teams.
Leverage cutting-edge technologies and AI tools.
Continuous learning: fresh challenges, mentorship, and growth opportunities.
Inclusive culture: Diversity valued, fresh perspectives encouraged.
End-to-end ownership: You architect, build, deliver, and learn in every project.

 

PurpleMerit is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We value diversity, encourage fresh perspectives, and are committed to building an inclusive environment for all employees.




If you are passionate about building impactful software and eager to work in an AI-driven startup, apply now and start your career with PurpleMerit!




Apply now to start your career with PurpleMerit!

title: Shopify Developer
job_description:
About the job

About Us

UnfoldCRO helps Shopify store owners maximize their online potential through conversion rate optimization, custom Shopify development, and SEO strategies. We work with clients worldwide to create ecommerce experiences that convert visitors into loyal customers.




Role Overview

 We‚Äôre looking for a motivated Shopify Developer who is passionate about ecommerce and eager to learn. You will work closely with our design and optimization teams to build, customize, and enhance Shopify stores for our clients.




Key Responsibilities

Develop and customize Shopify themes
Implement responsive designs and ensure cross-browser compatibility
Assist in optimizing store performance and speed
Collaborate with the team to integrate CRO and SEO best practices
Troubleshoot and fix bugs or functionality issues




Requirements

Basic knowledge of Shopify, Liquid, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Understanding of responsive design principles
Problem-solving mindset and attention to detail
Ability to work independently in a remote setup
Strong willingness to learn and adapt to new tools and processes




Nice to Have

Familiarity with Shopify apps and APIs
Understanding of ecommerce conversion principles




What We Offer

Flexible remote work environment
Hands-on training and mentorship
Opportunity to work on real client projects from day one
Career growth in a fast-paced ecommerce optimization agency

title: Python Developer
job_description:
About the job

Job Summary / About the Role

ARSoft Consulting is seeking a motivated and detail-oriented Python Developer with 2‚Äì3 years of professional experience to join our growing team. This role will involve designing, developing, and maintaining Python-based applications and solutions for enterprise clients. The ideal candidate will be adept at writing clean, efficient code and have a strong understanding of modern software development practices.

You will work closely with cross-functional teams, contributing to various phases of the development lifecycle, from concept through deployment. This is a remote, full-time position, offering flexibility and opportunities to work on projects with global impact.

Key Responsibilities
Develop, test, and maintain Python-based applications and scripts.
Collaborate with software engineers, business analysts, and stakeholders to gather requirements and translate them into technical solutions.
Optimise code for performance, scalability, and maintainability.
Integrate third-party APIs and libraries into applications.
Implement automated testing frameworks and ensure code quality standards are met.
Troubleshoot, debug, and upgrade existing systems as required.
Maintain detailed documentation for code, processes, and system configurations.
Stay up to date with emerging Python frameworks, libraries, and best practices.
Required Qualifications
Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related discipline.
2‚Äì3 years of professional experience in Python development.
Proficiency with Python 3.x and common libraries (e.g., Pandas, NumPy, Requests).
Experience with Django, Flask, or FastAPI frameworks.
Solid understanding of RESTful APIs and web services.
Familiarity with version control systems such as Git.
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Good written and verbal communication skills in English.
Preferred Qualifications (Nice-to-Have)
Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or GCP.
Knowledge of containerisation tools (e.g., Docker).
Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines.
Understanding of database technologies (e.g., PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB).
Exposure to agile software development methodologies.
What We Offer
Competitive salary based on experience.
Flexible remote working environment.
Opportunities to work on diverse, international projects.
Professional development and learning opportunities.
Supportive and collaborative team culture.
About the Company

ARSoft Consulting is a boutique consulting firm founded by professionals with extensive international exposure and a collective experience of over 50 years. The founders have worked with a variety of Fortune 500 companies worldwide, spanning regions such as the United States, the United Kingdom, Europe, Australia, Singapore, and Latin America. This deep-rooted expertise enables ARSoft Consulting to bring valuable global insights and best practices to its clients.

Currently, the firm is supporting a major client headquartered in Australia, with operations extending to South Africa and New Zealand. This partnership reflects ARSoft Consulting‚Äôs commitment to delivering quality and reliable services across diverse markets.

Location & Work Mode: Remote, Full-Time

Equal Opportunity Statement

ARSoft Consulting is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, colour, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, or age.

title: Project Manager Intern
job_description:
About the job

We‚Äôre an early-stage startup at Spikeera, currently in the process of building our very first team and launching operations. At present, there are no team members on board ‚Äî which means you‚Äôll be part of the founding batch of interns, helping us set up systems, processes, and workflows from scratch.




We will be working across eCommerce, IT services, and developing our own digital products. We‚Äôre looking for a Project Manager Intern to join us at this exciting stage to help coordinate projects, organize workflows, and manage progress as we get started.




Key Responsibility:




Assist in hiring and onboarding developers, designers, and interns
Create and manage team workflows.
Track deadlines, task updates, and delivery timelines
Coordinate remote meetings and stand-ups
Communicate progress reports and blockers to the founder
Help document internal processes and project updates




Requirement:




Basic understanding of software development lifecycle (SDLC)
Familiarity with project management tools like Notion, Trello, or Jira. (Not Mandatory)
Comfortable using communication tools like Zoom, Google Meet or Discord.
Ability to create and maintain task boards, timelines, and progress reports
Basic proficiency in Microsoft Word and Excel (or Google Docs and Sheets) is helpful but not mandatory
Basic knowledge of web development (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) is a bonus but not required
Experience with Canva or similar design tools is a plus but optional
English proficiency: Intermediate+
Must have reliable Wi-Fi, a laptop/computer, and a microphone for remote communication




What You Will Get:




Internship Completion Certificate
Letter of Recommendation (based on performance)
Opportunity to grow with us and potential for a paid role as the company scales
Exposure to real-world projects (services + product)
Flexible, remote-first internship




Ideal For:




Freshers, recent graduates, or early professionals available for full-time commitment
Aspiring project managers, business analysts, or startup enthusiasts looking to grow their skills
Anyone eager to gain hands-on experience in real-world startup and tech operations




Internship Details:

Duration: 3 months (with possibility of extension based on performance and company needs)
Type: Unpaid Internship
Location: Remote
Working Hours: Full-time preferred
Stipend: Currently unpaid ‚Äî may convert to a paid role as we grow and begin generating revenue

title: Digital Marketing Intern: SEO, Outreach & Conversion Strategy
job_description:
About the job

Digital Marketing Intern: SEO, Outreach & Conversion Strategy




Duration & Compensation:

 ‚Ä¢ Duration: 3 months (extendable based on performance)

 ‚Ä¢ Type: Paid Internship with strong possibility of Pre-Placement Offer (PPO)

 ‚Ä¢ Stipend: Based on your experience and learning curve




About Us: The Merc is a product-focused design studio that partners with SaaS companies, startups, and founders to craft clean, strategic digital experiences. We‚Äôre now expanding our growth and client performance capabilities, and looking for an ambitious digital marketing intern to join us on that journey.




What You‚Äôll Do:




You‚Äôll work directly with the founder and get hands-on exposure across 3 core areas:




1. SEO Strategy & Implementation

 ‚Ä¢ Assist in keyword research, content optimization, and technical SEO audits

 ‚Ä¢ Help analyze traffic data and suggest on-page improvements




2. Direct Outreach & Demand Generation

 ‚Ä¢ Learn and support direct outreach strategies using tools like Smartlead, Instantly, etc.

 ‚Ä¢ Help personalize messaging for outbound campaigns (emails, LinkedIn, etc.)

 ‚Ä¢ Research and build lead lists for cold outreach




3. Conversion Optimization for Clients

 ‚Ä¢ Assist in improving landing pages for higher conversions (strategy, not design)

 ‚Ä¢ Work on funnel analysis and user behavior to suggest optimizations

 ‚Ä¢ Collaborate with design and strategy teams to execute A/B tests




What We‚Äôre Looking For:

 ‚Ä¢ Strong interest in digital marketing, growth, and conversion strategy

 ‚Ä¢ Basic understanding of SEO, email marketing, or landing page funnels is a plus

 ‚Ä¢ Hunger to learn, experiment, and build real-world skills

 ‚Ä¢ Strong communication and research skills

 ‚Ä¢ Proactive, self-driven, and detail-oriented mindset




What You‚Äôll Gain:

 ‚Ä¢ Direct mentorship from the founder

 ‚Ä¢ Real exposure to growth strategies that drive revenue

 ‚Ä¢ Portfolio-worthy projects and client experience

 ‚Ä¢ Certificate + recommendation letter upon successful completion

 ‚Ä¢ Possibility of PPO based on performance




Internship Duration & Stipend:

 ‚Ä¢ Duration: 3 months (extendable)

 ‚Ä¢ Stipend: ‚Çπ7,000 ‚Äì ‚Çπ10,000/month (based on experience and learning curve)




Work Format:

 ‚Ä¢ Hybrid (Jaipur-based preferred, but remote candidates welcome if proactive)

title: Java Software Engineer
job_description:
About the job




Job Summary:




We are looking for a skilled Java Software Engineer to join our development team. The ideal candidate will have experience designing, developing, and maintaining scalable Java applications. You should be comfortable with both back-end and full-stack development, working in a collaborative environment to build high-performance, secure, and user-friendly solutions.




Key Responsibilities:




Design, develop, and maintain robust Java-based applications.
Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code following best practices.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams including product managers, QA, and DevOps.
Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues in development, testing, and production environments.
Participate in code reviews and contribute to team knowledge sharing.
Develop and integrate APIs and external services.
Optimize application performance and scalability.
Ensure security and data protection compliance.
Maintain documentation for software development and deployment processes.




Requirements:




Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.
Proven experience as a Java Developer or Java Software Engineer.
Strong knowledge of Java (preferably Java 8 or above), OOP, and design patterns.
Hands-on experience with frameworks like Spring Boot, Hibernate, or JPA.
Familiarity with RESTful APIs and microservices architecture.
Experience with relational databases (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL) and/or NoSQL (e.g., MongoDB).
Proficient in version control tools like Git.
Basic knowledge of front-end technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) is a plus.
Good understanding of Agile methodologies and SDLC.




Preferred Qualifications:




Experience with cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or GCP.
Knowledge of containerization tools like Docker and Kubernetes.
Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines (e.g., Jenkins, GitHub Actions).
Experience with unit testing and test-driven development (TDD).




Soft Skills:




Excellent problem-solving skills.
Strong communication and teamwork abilities.
Eagerness to learn and adapt to new technologies.
Attention to detail and a passion for quality.

title: Golang Developer
job_description:
About the job

At Travel & Payments, we are looking to hire for one of our clients. While this seems like an outsourced work, but it is specialized because of two reasons:

audiences.

‚óè Entrepreneurship.

‚óè Detail-oriented with a strategic mindset and the ability to think critically and creatively to

solve complex problems and drive business growth.

‚óè Fluency English.




Preferred Qualifications

‚óè Experience in the payment industry.

‚óè Experience integrating Payment Service Providers.

title: Zoho Developer
job_description:
About the job

Techworkstalent Company Overview

Techworkstalent (TWT) is an emerging startup in the technology and consulting sector, specializing in digital transformation for businesses. The company leverages new-age AI tools, cognitive computing, hyper-automation, analytics, cloud, and robotics to help clients navigate and adapt to the fast-evolving digital world. As an authorized Zoho Partner, Techworkstalent delivers consulting, implementation, and support services across Zoho's suite of apps, successfully completing numerous projects in varied industries and offering tailored solutions for unique business challenges. The team is led by veteran IT professionals with deep experience in program management and digital transformation.




Job Description: Zoho Developer

Location

Alwarpet, Chennai




100% Work from Office




Responsibilities

Develop, customize, and implement applications using Zoho CRM, Zoho Books, Zoho Inventory, Zoho Creator, and other Zoho apps.




Create custom modules, forms, and reports tailored to business needs.




Design and modify workflows, automations, and complex business logic with Zoho Deluge scripting.




Integrate Zoho apps with third-party applications using REST APIs for seamless data flow.




Unit test and debug solutions to ensure reliability and quality.




Provide ongoing technical support and troubleshoot issues within Zoho applications.




Document changes, prepare user guides, and support training initiatives.




Collaborate closely with company stakeholders to gather requirements and translate into technical specifications.




Requirements

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.




At least 2 years of hands-on experience in Zoho app development and customization.




Proficiency in Zoho CRM, Zoho Creator, Zoho Books, Inventory, and other core Zoho platforms.




Solid understanding of web technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) and API integrations.




Strong communication skills and collaborative work ethic.




Ability to manage multiple projects and prioritize tasks efficiently.

title: Node JS & Backend Developer - Co-founding team member
job_description:
About the job

Job Description

WHO WE ARE 

Come join our Technology Team and start reimagining the future of the automotive aftermarket. We are a highly motivated tech-focused organization, excited to be amid dynamic innovation and transformational change. Driven by Advance‚Äôs top-down commitment to empowering our team members, we are focused on delighting our Customers with Care and Speed, through delivery of world class technology solutions and products. 

We value and cultivate our culture by seeking to always be collaborative, intellectually curious, fun, open, and diverse.‚ÄØ‚ÄØ You will be a key member of a growing and passionate group focused on collaborating across business and technology resources to drive forward key programs and projects building enterprise capabilities across Advance Auto Parts. 

The Opportunity

Join the AAP team and start reimagining the future of automotive retail. Disrupt the way consumers buy auto parts and‚ÄØtake on the industry‚Äôs biggest challengers‚ÄØto‚ÄØexecute on AAP's top-down‚ÄØcommitment to digital expansion. 

As a member of the Advance Auto Parts team, you will have an opportunity to disrupt a $150B auto parts industry to bring better and faster solutions to customers. You will be part of a team helping the company live its mission of ‚ÄúAdvancing a World in Motion‚Äù. The role is part of a‚ÄØmerit-based organization with‚ÄØa culture of professional‚ÄØgrowth and‚ÄØdevelopment,‚ÄØand emphasis on the latest tools, platforms and technologies. 

Responsibilities


Help in the migration and modernization of data platforms, moving applications and pipelines to Google Cloud-based solutions. 
Ensure data security and governance, enforcing compliance with industry standards and regulations. 
Help in managing and scale data pipelines from internal and external data sources to support new product launches and ensure high data quality. 
Help in developing automation and monitoring frameworks to capture key metrics and operational KPIs for pipeline performance. 
Collaborate with internal teams, including data science and product teams, to drive solutioning and proof-of-concept (PoC) discussions. 
Help in developing and optimizing procedures to transition data into production. 
Create and maintain technical documentation for sharing knowledge. 
Help in developing reusable packages and libraries to enhance development efficiency. 
Help in developing real-time and batch data processing solutions, integrating structured and unstructured data sources. 


Required Qualification


We are looking for a candidate with 1-2 years of experience in Data Engineering and Application development. They must have a graduate degree in Computer Science or a related field of study. They must have experience with programming languages such as Python, Java & DS&Algo, Spark, and Scala. Expertise in Python and Spark is a must. 
Exposure of AWS and Cloud technologies. Experience in data platform engineering, with a focus on cloud transformation and modernization. 
Hands-on experience building large, scaled data pipelines in cloud environments and handling of data in PBs. 
Experience with CI/CD pipeline management in GCP DevOps. 
Understanding of data governance, security, and compliance best practices. 
Experience working in an Agile development environment. 
Prior experience in migrating applications from legacy platforms to the cloud. 
Knowledge of Terraform or Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) for cloud resource management. 
Familiarity with Kafka, Event Hubs, or other real-time data streaming solutions. 
Experience with legacy RDBMS (Oracle, DB2, Teradata) & DataStage/Talend 
Having background supporting data science models in production. 


California Residents Click Below For Privacy Notice

https://jobs.advanceautoparts.com/us/en/disclosures

We are an Equal Opportunity Employer and do not discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment because of race, color, sex, age national origin, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, status as a veteran and basis of disability or any other federal, state or local protected class.

title: AI/ML Engineer
job_description:
About the job

Company Description
 
ICEGlobal ECommerce Technology Pvt. Ltd. is launching a MY MOVIES - Online Exhibition Portal for Movie Industry and with millions of Film Fan Club Members Community and over 10000 movies promotion and ICE is also launching and operating a scalable and innovative business model that has been tested by thousands of sellers across 20 cities in 14 Indian states. ICEGlobal (ICE 2.0) brings this trusted platform online, allowing brands to showcase and sell their products while gaining meaningful insights through weekly themed expos on ICEBUY. This unique model offers buyers fresh deals, discounts, and opportunities every week, integrating social media capabilities, AR/VR, Web 3, and metaverse experiences. ICEBUY aims to significantly boost online sales for both high-value established brands and the Indian MSME sector, making it a catalyst for the Indian economy.

 Role Description
 
This is a full-time on-site role for a Node JS & Backend Developer - Co-founding team member for the MY MOVIES Portal at ICEGlobal ECommerce Technology Pvt. Ltd. Based in Bengaluru, the developer will be responsible for front-end and back-end web development, software development, and working with JavaScript and Redux.js. Day-to-day tasks include designing and developing server-side logic, ensuring high performance and responsiveness to front-end requests, and collaborating with team members to deliver high-quality products.

 Qualifications
 

Front-End Development and JavaScript skills
Back-End Web Development, including experience with Node.js
Software Development skills
Experience with Redux.js
Strong problem-solving abilities and collaboration skills
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field
Experience in eCommerce platforms is a plus

title: HTML/CSS Frontend Designer
job_description:
About the job

Job Description for the AI/ML Role: 




Job Role: AI/ML Engineer

Job Type: Permanent Full time

Location: Pune (Hybrid) 

Notice Period: Immediate Joiners

Experience: 1 to 4 years




Job Description: 

We are seeking a dynamic AI & Machine Learning Engineer to join our team. This role is pivotal in implementing AI and machine learning solutions on cloud-based platforms, staying abreast of emerging trends in AI, developing proofs-of-concept, and collaborating with internal and external stakeholders to transition concepts to production. Additionally, this role involves the application of engineering principles from the classical software development lifecycle to AI and machine learning.




Key Responsibilities:

Develop AI & Machine Learning solutions on cloud-based platforms.
Identify, access, import, clean, and format data from various sources.
Implement research findings and custom models effectively.
Construct backend systems to interface with other microservices.
Train and optimize machine learning models for optimal performance.
Engineer scalable machine intelligence systems and infrastructure for real-world deployment.
Justify the application of AI/ML solutions based on problem statements.
Prototype solutions efficiently and deliver results promptly.
Manipulate data using SQL and scripting languages.
Collaborate with internal and external teams to design and deploy AI & ML solutions.
Explore emerging AI & Machine learning trends and develop prototypes.
Demonstrate effective communication and teamwork skills.




Experience And Qualifications Required:

Proven experience in leading AI projects.
Proficiency in cloud deployment of AI solutions (AWS, GCP, or Azure).
Familiarity with Lang chain, advanced RAG applications, and Vector database.
Experience in developing advanced Gen AI solutions.
Strong analytical skills including data pre-processing and various ML techniques.
Expertise in model building, optimization, and data visualization.
Knowledge of major ML algorithms for Natural Language Processing, Computer Vision & Graph Networks.
Hands-on experience with cloud platforms like AWS/Microsoft Azure.
Proficient in SQL query development.
Familiarity with data platforms such as Snowflake is advantageous.
Knowledge of MLOps (Machine Learning Operations) is a plus.
Experience in advanced Computer Vision model development is beneficial.
Practical experience in deep learning projects is highly valued.
Ability to enhance the accuracy, runtime, scalability, and reliability of machine intelligence systems.
Proficient in understanding underlying mathematical concepts and algorithms.
Enthusiasm for continuous learning of state-of-the-art techniques in ML/Data science.

What You'll Do:

title: Title not extracted
job_description:
About the job

Join a hybrid crew of technologists and business strategists that builds enterprise-grade platforms for global manufacturers, builders, D2C brands, and B2B brands. Work side-by-side with experienced mentors who‚Äôve scaled systems to millions of users, and ship code to production in your first week while learning directly from senior engineers. 




WHAT YOU‚ÄôLL DO

* Design and develop high-quality Java applications with a strong focus on code reliability and maintainability

* Model and query data in MongoDB; optimize indexes for <50 ms reads. 

* Consume & document REST APIs using Postman / Swagger. 

* Pair-program with front-end devs to deliver end-to-end features. 

* Write clean, peer-reviewed code, *test / debug rigorously,* and contribute to sprint demos. 




MUST-HAVE

* Pursuing / completed CS or Engineering degree 

* Java fundamentals ¬∑ Basic MongoDB schema/query ¬∑ REST concepts ¬∑ Git basics 

* Clear written & spoken English; collaborative, fast learner




GREAT-TO-HAVE

Spring Boot ¬∑ React.js exposure ¬∑ CI/CD (GitHub Actions) ¬∑ API testing tools (Postman / Swagger)




WHAT YOU‚ÄôLL GET

* Dedicated mentor, weekly code reviews, Udemy budget 

* PPO consideration for top performers

* Remuneration best in Industry 




Show us your craft link a GitHub repo where your Java code talks to any NoSQL DB, or give us a short write-up of one you‚Äôve built.
